title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze the performance of a rocket engine and its fuel system, and propose improvements for efficiency and safety.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze the combustion processes in a rocket engine, identify potential issues, and propose solutions.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design an optimal rocket nozzle configuration considering factors like thrust, efficiency, and cooling requirements.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Demonstrate understanding of fundamental aerodynamic principles, including lift, drag, and pressure distribution around spacecraft.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze fluid flow patterns around spacecraft during various flight regimes and evaluate their impact on vehicle performance.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study thermal loads during atmospheric entry and develop strategies for thermal protection system design.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design and analyze spacecraft structural components considering launch loads, thermal stresses, and material properties.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate and optimize orbital parameters for various mission scenarios, including transfer orbits and rendezvous operations.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive evaluation of spacecraft systems integration, including subsystem interfaces, requirements management, and risk assessment.
